sourcesContent:
import anecdoteReducer, { newAnecdote } from "./reducers/anecdoteReducer"
import notificationReducer from "./reducers/notificationReducer"
import filterReducer from "./reducers/filterReducer"
import { composedWithDevTools } from 'redux-devtools-extension'
import { createStore, combineReducers } from 'redux'
import anecdoteService from "./services/anecdotes"


const reducer = combineReducers({
    anecdotes: anecdoteReducer,
    notification: notificationReducer,
    filter: filterReducer
})

const store = createStore(reducer, composedWithDevTools)

anecdoteService.getAll().then(notes => notes.forEach(note => {
    store.dispatch(newAnecdote(note))
    console.log(note)
}))

export default store
